text: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

translation.en: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do
translation.id: Adapun orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, maka mereka akan mendapat surga-surga tempat kediaman, sebagai pahala atas apa yang telah mereka kerjakan
